aka: Sauvages, au coeur des zoos humains(法)
Savages: The Story of Human Zoos

cast.name: 阿卜德·阿尔·马利克 Abd Al Malik
利利安·图拉姆 Lilian Thuram

this_title: Sauvages, au coeur des zoos humains
trans_title: Sauvages, au coeur des zoos humains(法)
Savages: The Story of Human Zoos
introduction: "Wild, in the heart of the human zoo" - For more than a century, from 1810 to 1940, men have exhibited other men by presenting them as savages or monsters. More than a billion and a half visitors came to observe 35,000 exhibited around the world. They are called Little Capeline, Patagonian fuégienne, Tambo, aboriginal of Australia, Moliko, Kalina of Guyana, Ota Benga, Pygmy of Congo, Jean Thiam, Wolof of Senegal, Marius Kaloïe, Kanak of New Caledonia.—Ulf Kjell Gür
chinese_title: Sauvages, au coeur des zoos humains
